ROW.DATDSC: select guid,rn 序号,任务号,核实年月,状态,股室,税管员,核实类型,企业编号,企业名称,供电区域,乡镇 from ( select rownum rn,a.guid,a.bilid 任务号, a.yymm1||'~'||a.yymm2 核实年月, decode(a.stat,'1','未分派','2','已分派','3','已处理','8','已分派县局','9','已完成',a.stat) 状态, nvl(b.name,a.todept) 股室, a.tousr 税管员, decode(a.subtyp,'1','有电力无缴税','2','有缴税无电力','3','电力税负异常','4','行业税负异常','5','无电表号纳税','6','无企业电表号','7','电力税额异常',subtyp) 核实类型, a.cmid 企业编号, a.cmnam 企业名称, a.town 供电区域, c.towns 乡镇 from tax_trkhdr a,v_dept b,v_tax_company c where a.todept=b.id(+) and a.org=b.org(+) and a.cmid=c.id(+) --and a.dat>=to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd') --and a.dat<=to_date('[%DAT2]','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(a.dat,'YYYY-MM')>=decode('[%DAT1]','','1900-01','[%DAT1]') and to_char(a.dat,'YYYY-MM')<=decode('[%DAT2]','','2900-01','[%DAT2]') and a.stat like '[%STAT]%' and nvl(a.tousr,' ') like (select name from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%TAXMAN]')||'%' and todept=(select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and nvl(a.subtyp,' ') like '[%TYP]%' and nvl(a.cmid,' ') like '[%CMPID]%' order by a.crtdat desc ) order by rn
